branchCategory.name: 11/22-MHZ2
branchCategory.description: <P>The 11/22-MHZ2 series is a clean room series standard type parallel air gripper, taking the place of the MHQ(G)2 series. A linear guide provides high rigidity and high accuracy. MHZ2 can operate under higher pressure even at a larger holding point and overhang. High degree of mounting precision is achieved and mounting repeatability is improved. </P>

branchItem.name: 11/22-MHZ2, Air Gripper, Clean Series
branchItem.description: <P>The 11/22-MHZ2 series is a clean room series standard type parallel air gripper, taking the place of the MHQ(G)2 series. A linear guide provides high rigidity and high accuracy. MHZ2 can operate under higher pressure even at a larger holding point and overhang.
